front.title: The Lightweight Directory Access Protocol (LDAP) Subentry Name Form

abstract.t: This informational Internet-Draft (I-D) clarifies certain aspects of RFC3672, and provides commentary regarding the behavior of DIT structure rules and name forms as they relate to, and interact with, subentries present within various directory implementations. This I-D also incorporates the 'subentryNameForm' derived from ITU-T Rec. X.501.
